column4: I ran into that same problem. It is due to the Ubuntu Permission policy. About a week ago maco said he would poke the developers to see how much work it would take to add umask suport to the iso9660 filesystem.
alright phillipsjk.. i guess i will have to copy the entire cd to my hard drive... what a pain
That may go aginst Wine policy: Wine has a policy of not circumventing "copy protection."
it's okay.. i don't think this software has copy protection
